name: Neon Punk
stylesheet: QWidget { background-color: #0a001e; color: #ff00ff; } QPushButton { background-color: #1a0033; color: #ff00ff; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; border-radius: 3px; padding: 5px; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #ff00ff; color: #000000; } QListWidget { background-color: #1a0033; color: #ff00ff; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; border-radius: 3px; } QListWidget::item { padding: 5px; } QListWidget::item:selected { background-color: #ff00ff; color: #000000; } QTextEdit { background-color: #1a0033; color: #ff00ff; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; border-radius: 3px; } QComboBox { background-color: #1a0033; color: #ff00ff; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; border-radius: 3px; padding: 2px; } QComboBox::drop-down { subcontrol-origin: padding; subcontrol-position: top right; width: 15px; border-left-width: 1px; border-left-color: #ff00ff; border-left-style: solid; } QComboBox::down-arrow { image: url(noimg); width: 8px; height: 8px; } QComboBox QAbstractItemView { background-color: #1a0033; color: #ff00ff; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; selection-background-color: #ff00ff; selection-color: #000000; } QLineEdit { background-color: #1a0033; color: #ff00ff; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; border-radius: 3px; padding: 2px; } QCheckBox { color: #ff00ff; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 13px; height: 13px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { border: 1px solid #ff00ff; background-color: #1a0033; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { border: 1px solid #ff00ff; background-color: #ff00ff; } QGroupBox { background-color: #1a0033; color: #ff00ff; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; border-radius: 3px; margin-top: 1ex; } QGroupBox::title { subcontrol-origin: margin; subcontrol-position: top left; padding: 0 3px; }
